Detailed Description

Represents a bounded item which can get an image as input. When adding the ImageItem to the editor document, a clone of the ImageItem will be made so that the original ImageItem can be deleted at any time.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ImageItem::ImageItem (  const ImageObtainer &  obtainer  )  [explicit]
 

Parameters:
obtainer Image obtainer which contains the image. A copy of the obtainer is kept inside the ImageItem, which means that the passed obtainer can be deleted at any time.

Member Function Documentation

AtomItem * ImageItem::Clone (   )  const [virtual]
 

Returns a pointer to a flat copy of this object, hence the cloned object and the original object are pointing to the same image.
